name: Dr. Sarah Chen
background: PhD from MIT. Former Google researcher. Specializes in algorithms and complexity theory. Known for clear explanations and challenging problem sets.
studentSentiment: students appreciate her clarity and depth

name: Prof. Michael Rodriguez
background: MBA from Wharton. Former Deloitte consultant. 15 years industry experience before academia. Practical, case-study focused teaching.

name: Dr. James Park
background: PhD in Statistics from Stanford. Former data scientist at Meta. Founder of two AI startups. Known for bridging theory and practice.
studentSentiment: inspiring and practical, excellent for career prep

name: Dr. Emily Watson
background: PhD from Oxford. Specializes in philosophy of mind and AI ethics. Published author. Thoughtful and accessible teaching style.

name: Prof. David Kim
background: MS from Carnegie Mellon. Former tech lead at Amazon. Co-founder of a Y Combinator startup. Real-world software engineering focus.
studentSentiment: demanding but prepares you for industry

name: Prof. Lisa Anderson
background: MBA from Harvard. Former investment banker at Goldman Sachs. Focuses on practical finance applications for banking careers.
studentSentiment: excellent for finance recruiting, very connected

name: Dr. Robert Martinez
background: PhD in History of Science from Harvard. Interdisciplinary scholar. Thoughtful approach to technology ethics.

name: Prof. Jennifer Lee
background: MBA from Kellogg. Former brand manager at Procter & Gamble. Marketing strategist with consulting experience.
